item.description:
Join us for a fun, BEAUTIFUL evening of "FREE Live Outdoor Music" in Elizabeth Park's Rose Garden Lawn.

Gather @ 6:00 (show 6:30 - 8:00).

Find me/us on a blue-on-blue UHaul blanket near a white stick w/ red reflector.

>>> BYOB and snacks/Picnic dinner, if you'd like. As always, be discreet, don't litter, and drive responsibly!

>>> To cut down on email updates, please check back here by 3PM the day of the event for any updated info.

See you there!

- Rob Pudney
C: 860-690-9595
rep06450@cox.net

***
Elizabeth Park
1555 Asylum Avenue
Rose Garden Lawn
West Hartford, CT 06107
860-231-9443

07/25: "River City Slim & the Zydeco Hogs" <<< combined MeetUp & Single Event <<<

group.name: Entertainment CT .com VIP Club Music Theatre Golf Friends

item.name: River City Slim & the Zydeco Hogs - Elizabeth Park 6:00
